ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourging punishment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So your Lord poured a scourge of punishment over them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then their Lord unloosed upon them the lash of chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus, your Lord afflicted them with torment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore your Lord struck them hard with the means of punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, your Lord poured on them different kinds of severe torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore your Lord let down upon them a portion of the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thy Lord unloosed on them a scourge of chastisement;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefore thy Lord poured on them the disaster of His punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so your Lord unleashed on them the scourge of punishment:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore thy Lord poured on them the scourge of His torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: so your Lord poured on them lashes of punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore did thy Lord pour on them a scourge of diverse chastisements:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So your Lord poured on them different kinds of severe torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Therefore) your Lord let loose upon them a scourge of punishment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So your Lord poured down upon them a scourge of punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:13] So your Lord poured on them a scourge of chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore thy Lord poured on them the disaster of His punishment) your Lord sent on them a severe punishment.
